item.title: Cat Molly's bathroom encounter: playful tap leads to unpleasant scratch
item.description: In a recent incident in Kharkiv, Ukraine, captured on video by @vasilisovna_ket on October 2, 2023, a cat named Molly had an unexpected reaction to some bathroom exploration. Molly was peacefully perched on a bathroom surface, being admired by her owner. However, things took a surprising turn when @vasilisovna_ket began tapping something with her nails nearby. Startled by the noise, Molly swiftly pounced on her owner's hand and delivered an unpleasant scratch.

item.title: Feathered fury: mother hen chases mischievous corgi in Vietnam
item.description: In a playful yet feathery showdown, a mischievous Corgi named Salt found itself in a flap of trouble in Tra Vinh province, Vietnam. Captured on video by @radiobonchan on September 1, 2023, the canine culprit had stirred the ire of a vigilant mother hen. The drama unfolded when Salt decided to chase after the hen's fluffy chicks, triggering a fierce retaliation from the protective mother. As the ruckus escalated, the corgi made a hasty retreat towards the safety of its owner's house, where the daring chase came to an end.

item.title: Child's act of kindness: boy comforts crying sister after accidental dumbbell mishap
item.description: In a heartwarming moment captured by @bombeesu on August 17, 2023, in the Dai Tu district of Thai Nguyen Province, Vietnam, three children were seen engrossed in outdoor play, using homemade dumbbells for fun. However, a playful moment took an unexpected turn when one of the small boys accidentally dropped a dumbbell, which struck his little sister's foot. Immediately, the young boy rushed to his sister's side, comforting her as tears welled up in her eyes.

item.title: Deer and fawn encounter during crossbow deer hunting opening day
item.description: On September 30, 2023, in Saint-Charles-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada, a remarkable wildlife encounter unfolded during the opening day of crossbow deer hunting. A video captured by @chassepeche001 showcased a doe and her fawn hiding in the bushes. The situation took an unexpected turn when the observer suddenly needed to cough, drawing the attention of the deer. The mother deer gazed at the intruder for approximately 10 seconds, who remained completely still. Then, the doe began to emit a series of warning whistles before swiftly retreating into the dense forest, all while maintaining a hissing sound.
item.slugline: Deer and fawn encounter during crossbow deer hunting opening day

item.title: Devastation strikes Mykolaiv: administrative building hit by shelling amidst ongoing conflict
item.description: On September 30, 2023, in Mykolaiv, Ukraine, an administrative building fell victim to shelling amidst the ongoing conflict between Russia and Ukraine. The grim scene was captured on video by @roman_medyanik, revealing a gaping hole in the heart of the multi-story structure. In the footage, @roman_medyanik expressed the urgent need for an end to the war, stating, "We arrived in Mykolaiv, and there, in the morning, a rocket once again flew into one of the administrative buildings. And we came to Mykolaiv to start a pilgrimage, to perform a spiritual action with the chaplain brothers, so that this war would stop."
item.slugline: Devastation strikes Mykolaiv: administrative building hit by shelling amidst ongoing conflict

item.title: Thrilling ride at Dream World Amusement Park: hilarious screams and balancing act!
item.description: At Dream World Amusement Park in Bangkok, Thailand, a recent visit by @dom260997 and friends turned into a hilarious adventure. In a video captured on August 2, 2023, one brave friend decided to take on a round machine designed for two people. As he climbed in, the machine tilted dramatically to one side, prompting an immediate burst of screams. Laughter erupted among the onlooking friends as the lone rider's shrieks filled the air. item.description: In a captivating moment captured by @g.valeri.i on September 13, 2023, in Zaporizhzhia, Ukraine, Samuel the cat became the star of a mesmerizing feline spectacle. item.title: Unexpected cenote darkness: snorkeling adventure in Cancun
item.description: On May 11, 2023, in Cancun, Mexico, adventure-seeker @alecascan embarked on a snorkeling escapade with her boyfriend. As they dipped their feet into the crystal-clear waters, little did they know that they were about to capture a truly surprising moment. Armed with her camera, @alecascan decided to record the underwater world beneath them. To her amazement, the footage revealed a deep, eerie darkness that concealed the depths of a cenote. The unexpected encounter with the cenote's mysterious abyss left her both intrigued and startled.

item.title: Teen's birthday surprise goes awry: flour explosion leads to near fire disaster
item.description: On September 29, 2023, in Voronezh, Russia, a birthday celebration took a terrifying turn when a group of friends decided to surprise their 17-year-old friend with an unconventional birthday cake presentation. As they presented the young man with a cake adorned with lit candles, an unexpected twist occurred. As he leaned in to blow out the candles, he was suddenly showered with flour from behind, and a fire erupted in an instant. Panic ensued as the flames spread, but fortunately, quick-thinking friends managed to extinguish the fire before it caused any serious harm. The birthday boy escaped the incident with only scorched eyelashes, with champagne at the party possibly playing a role in preventing more severe consequences.
item.slugline: Teen's birthday surprise goes awry: flour explosion leads to near fire disaster

item.title: Ukraine conflict: devastating shelling sparks inferno in Avdiivka residential building
item.description: In Avdiivka, Ukraine, a harrowing video captured by @alexbutukr on September 23, 2023, reveals the grim aftermath of shelling amidst the ongoing conflict between Ukraine and Russia. The footage depicts a residential building engulfed in flames and thick smoke, a haunting testament to the brutal impact of the conflict on civilian life. Against this backdrop of devastation, a lone individual is seen courageously passing in front of the blazing structure, carrying a box and a water can. This poignant scene unfolds as humanitarian aid efforts, led by @alexbutukr's charitable organization, zhyva.nadia, strive to bring much-needed relief to those affected by the relentless conflict, offering a glimmer of hope amid the flames of adversity.

item.description: In a playful moment captured by @renalezcano_ on September 17, 2023, in Mar del Plata, Argentina, a group of friends found themselves in fits of laughter as they tried to kick a ball off a balcony. item.title: Skydiving instructor rescues spinning student in dramatic free fall
item.description: In a heart-pounding moment captured on video on July 28, 2023, in Kemerovo, Russia, a skilled skydiving instructor, @anti.bloger, came to the rescue of a struggling student in mid-air. The student had leaped out of an aircraft for a thrilling free fall experience but found themselves in a perilous situation, spiraling uncontrollably with no parachute deployment in sight. Without hesitation, the instructor, who was closely following the student, took swift action and assisted in deploying the parachute, ensuring a safe and dramatic landing for the student.

item.title: Child rescued from door lock mishap: a happy ending in Klaten, Indonesia
item.description: On September 19, 2023, in Klaten, Jawa Tengah, Indonesia, a child named Arvin found himself in a sticky situation when his curiosity got the best of him. Captured on video by @purplegirl13, young Arvin had managed to get his index finger stuck in a door lock while his mother scolded him for his misadventure. The tense moment was diffused when a quick-thinking rescuer applied cooking oil to the finger, allowing it to slip free from the lock. Despite the scolding, Arvin's relief and happiness were palpable after the successful rescue.

item.description: In a gripping moment at the Villa del Dique motorbike race in Córdoba Province, Argentina, captured by @sintacosdudes on September 17, 2023, a motorbike racer faced a dramatic fall. item.title: Chapman's Peak Drive battling 'Black South Easter' storm in Cape Town
item.description: On September 25, 2023, @traveltosouthafrica captured a striking video in Cape Town, South Africa, showcasing the aftermath of a relentless storm that had left a tarmac road covered in mud. Located halfway up the iconic Chapman's Peak Drive, a renowned roadway known for its breathtaking views and hairpin turns, the video revealed the impact of a rare weather phenomenon known as the "Black South Easter." The storm brought non-stop torrential rain, a phenomenon not experienced in the Cape for quite some time. Chapman's Peak Drive is no stranger to environmental challenges, often facing the threat of rock falls, which explains the sturdy netting strategically placed along its 114 curved passes.

item.title: Resilience amidst ruin: watermelon thrives in devastated central market of Kherson, Ukraine
item.description: In a stark symbol of resilience amidst destruction, a video captured by @dy1px0sfosof on September 21, 2023, at the Central Market of Kherson, Ukraine, showcases the aftermath of shelling that left several buildings in ruins as a result of the ongoing conflict between Ukraine and Russia. The heart-wrenching footage reveals a city center scarred by the ravages of war. However, amidst the devastation, a small yet remarkable sight emerges – a watermelon growing inconspicuously in the midst of the turmoil. As @dy1px0sfosof aptly observes, "This is the Central Market of Kherson, after the shelling, everything burned down. And here in the middle of the city is a watermelon, just a small watermelon growing in the middle of the city."

item.title: Dramatic escape: residents use drainage pipes to flee Moscow apartment fire
item.description: In Moscow, Russia, on September 23, 2023, a harrowing incident unfolded as a residential building in the Fili-Davydkovo area was engulfed in flames. The blaze originated in an apartment within building 27 on Kastanaevskaya Street. Startling footage circulated online, capturing the desperate attempts of residents to escape by descending down drainpipes from their apartments. Amidst the chaos, a five-year-old child sustained injuries and was promptly hospitalized. The fallen person was hospitalized as well.

item.title: Severe weather delays Austin FC vs. LA Galaxy game at Q2 Stadium in Austin, Texas
item.description: Severe weather conditions wreaked havoc in Austin, Texas, USA, on the night of September 24, 2023, forcing a delay in the highly anticipated match between Austin FC and LA Galaxy at Q2 Stadium. The stadium was shrouded in mist, with spectators waving green flags as gusty winds and hail battered the area. Q2 Stadium officials announced a mandatory shelter-in-place protocol after lightning was detected within the safety perimeter. The National Weather Service had issued warnings about showers and thunderstorms in the region.

item.title: Ukrainian child's roundabout play amidst ruins: a harrowing portrait of conflict's toll
item.description: In a poignant scene captured by @sboeva_anastasiia in Kharkiv, Ukraine, on September 22, 2023, a video shows her son playing on a roundabout against the backdrop of a damaged residential building. The child's innocent curiosity is evident as he gazes at the nearby ruins. Anastasiia's words, "We came to our native Kharkiv for the first time in a couple of months. And here we see - ruins. And the son wanted to go on the swing, but sometimes he doesn't even understand that we brought him to, in fact, his second home, to show what the Russians did to his second home," speak volumes about the harsh realities faced by Ukrainians amid the ongoing conflict with Russia.

item.title: Medicine cabinet mischief: cat takes charge as 'pharmacist' in hilarious video
item.description: In a comical home video captured by Kirill on September 24, 2023, in Gomel, Belarus, a mischievous cat named Mickey took center stage in the household's medicine cabinet. The feline's audacious adventure began when he nonchalantly settled on a shelf amidst a collection of pharmaceutical tablets, seemingly unfazed by the glass cabinet door being opened by his owner. According to the author, the escapade unfolded as his girlfriend called him into the room, where Mickey had made himself comfortable. The cat's determination to remain on his newfound perch even after being asked to step down added a humorous twist to the scene. Kirill couldn't resist capturing the moment, and with a playful knock on the glass, he jokingly requested some "analgin" from his furry friend, casting Mickey as the pharmacist of the house. Fortunately, the cat eventually decided to relinquish his role and jumped down from the shelf, much to the amusement of all involved.

item.title: Moscow resident's reckless tire burnout nearly engulfs car in flames
item.description: On September 24, 2023, in Moscow, Russia, a shocking video surfaced showing a car engulfed in flames as its owner engaged in a conversation with a group of individuals while parked. The incident began with ominous plumes of smoke billowing from the vehicle's rear, quickly followed by roaring flames. Instead of evacuating the scene, the car's owner astonishingly decided to reverse the vehicle and drive away, all while the rear end of the car was ablaze. What initially appeared to be a daredevil tire-burning spectacle by a Moscow resident, designed to impress friends, nearly resulted in the complete destruction of his own car, aptly named Podem. Fortunately, the situation was brought under control by the prompt intervention of the Ministry of Emergency Situations.
item.slugline: Moscow resident's reckless tire burnout nearly engulfs car in flames

item.title: Tropical storm Ophelia approaches North Topsail beach near Wilmington!
item.description:
As Tropical Storm Ophelia advances towards the Wilmington area, residents and authorities are mobilizing to mitigate potential damage. With winds nearing hurricane levels and rainfall intensifying, concerns about the storm's impact are growing.
Governor Roy Cooper wasted no time in signing an executive order declaring a state of emergency. This measure allows for the swift allocation of resources and coordination of response efforts. Ophelia, currently positioned 120 miles southeast of Wilmington, is moving at a steady 13 mph in a north-northwest direction. It is expected to make landfall on the North Carolina coast before traversing through eastern North Carolina, southeastern Virginia, and the Delmarva Peninsula over the weekend.
Residents are urged to stay informed through official channels, follow any evacuation orders issued, and prepare emergency kits. Safety remains paramount as the community bands together to weather the impending storm. With collective vigilance and preparedness, Wilmington aims to navigate Ophelia's impact and emerge resilient.

item.title: The Ukrainian Armed Forces hit the headquarters of the Russian Black Sea Fleet with a missile
item.description: The Ukrainian Armed Forces launched a missile attack on the headquarters of the Black Sea Fleet in Sevastopol, the Russian Ministry of Defense reported. According to the department, one soldier is missing. A fire started in the building, the surrounding area was cordoned off by police, and roads in the city were blocked. The head of Crimea Aksenov said that several cruise missiles were shot down over the peninsula. During the attack, an American reconnaissance plane took off into the sky over the Black Sea.

item.title: Shattered windows: impact of Russian shelling on Ukrainian homes
item.description: In Cherkasy, Ukraine, the grim reality of the ongoing conflict with Russia came crashing through the windows of a local home, as captured by @studentsov.sss on September 21, 2023. In a chilling video, one window pane can be seen completely shattered, while another remains cracked, a stark testament to the violence that has engulfed the region. Glass debris litters the room, scattering across the floor and onto the sofa, serving as a somber reminder of the danger that civilians face daily. As @studentsov.sss notes, "It flew near the apartment. That's how the windows in the living room beat us."

item.title: Storm chaser captures developing mesocyclone near McCook, Nebraska
item.description: On September 21, 2023, in McCook, Nebraska, USA, storm chaser @mjfuld54/ @storm_scape captured a video of a developing storm just 10 miles west of the town. The video revealed ominous low-lying dark clouds, signaling the storm's intensity. At 4:45 PM Central Daylight Time, the storm chaser reported the reemergence of an upper-level mesocyclone, indicating the storm's attempt to intensify. Further south, another massive storm was underway, with rain enveloping the back porch. The two storms appeared to be merging into a single, formidable system. @mjfuld54/@storm_scape noted the possibility of a wall cloud forming, suggesting the potential for further weather developments in the vicinity of McCook.

item.title: Charming struggle: baby's knitted sandal mission in Hanoi
item.description: In a heartwarming video captured by @hoibimsua on August 23, 2023, in Hanoi, Vietnam, a delightful moment unfolded as a parent attempted to put a knitted sandal on their baby's tiny foot. The video, which solely focuses on the baby's restless foot, showcases the infant's playful resistance, wiggling and moving its foot as the parent persevered in their mission. After a brief struggle, the parent's determination paid off, and they successfully managed to slip the sandal onto the baby's foot. Throughout this endearing scene, the background echoed with the baby's cheerful babbling, making for a heartwarming and memorable family moment.

item.title: Seal escapes killer whales by climbing onto yacht in Avacha Bay, Kamchatka
item.description: In a remarkable wildlife encounter on September 6, 2023, in Kamchatka, Russia, captured by @Maxim Gaevoy, a seal found itself in a life-or-death situation as it attempted to evade a group of killer whales in Avacha Bay. The chase unfolded as several killer whales relentlessly pursued the seal, cornering it against the starboard side of the yacht. Quick-thinking crew members intervened, encouraging the distressed seal to climb onto the yacht's swimming platform for refuge. Once the seal was safe, the vessel wasted no time and accelerated away from the pursuing whales, ensuring the seal's survival.

item.title: Abandoned dog and puppies found in Izyum, Ukraine after liberation
item.description: In the aftermath of Izyum's liberation from Russian forces on September 12, 2022, a poignant scene unfolded as documented by @yaroslavlytcushun. A video captured a dog with her precious litter of puppies, seeking refuge beneath timeworn timber behind an abandoned house amidst the turmoil of war. The encounter occurred when a group of individuals, part of the assault brigades, ventured into the area. However, due to their subsequent deployment along the contact line, they were unable to provide long-term care for the canine family. Instead, the fate of the dog and her puppies fell into the hands of the local population, who had begun to return home following the city's liberation.

item.title: Heroic rescue: man saves dog amid Ukraine-Russia conflict
item.description: In a harrowing video captured by @ludenskyi on September 18, 2023, in Orikhiv, Ukraine, a man was seen heroically rescuing a dog from the midst of the Ukraine-Russia conflict. The man, whose home had been personally struck by enemy shells, risked his life to evacuate the frightened dog from the war-torn area. Holding the dog by its collar, he explained the dire situation, stating that the area was subjected to daily attacks. The rescued dog is now undergoing rehabilitation in Dnipro before finding its way to a shelter in Khmelnytskyi, where efforts will be made to secure a new loving family for the fortunate canine.

item.description: In a recent incident in Salatiga City, Central Java, Indonesia, a concerned citizen, @teransimalem09, captured a video on July 9, 2023 that has stirred emotions online. The footage shows a cat with its head trapped inside a plastic bag, struggling to navigate its surroundings. Eager to assist the distressed feline, @teransimalem09 attempted to approach it, but the cat's impaired vision caused it to flee in fear. Undeterred, the individual persevered, calling out to the cat as they followed it in an effort to provide the much-needed help.

item.title: Cat Wilson's close call with bears at a zoo in Buenos Aires, Argentina
item.description: In a heart-pounding moment at a zoo in Buenos Aires, Argentina, captured by @baltaaa4 on September 2, 2023, a daring cat named Wilson found itself in a perilous situation when it ventured into the territory of two bears. The bears wasted no time in pursuing the intruder, cornering it momentarily. Amidst the tense scene, the author could be heard anxiously calling out for Wilson. Miraculously, the nimble cat managed to outwit the bears, darting away and seeking refuge on a rock near a water pond. Wilson held his ground as the bears eventually gave up and retreated.

item.title: A man rescues squirrel from Khimki Reservoir
item.description: In a heartwarming display of compassion and quick thinking, a kind-hearted passerby in Moscow, Russia, came to the rescue of a stranded squirrel in the Khimki Reservoir on July 4, 2023. Upon spotting the distressed creature struggling in the water, the man wasted no time in fashioning an impromptu ladder from a nearby branch, offering the stranded squirrel a lifeline to safety. Although the brave little rodent initially had some difficulty scaling the makeshift ladder, perseverance paid off as it finally found its footing and climbed to safety. With a gentle hand, the man lowered the squirrel to solid ground, ensuring its safe return to the wild.

item.title: Law enforcement officer dismissed for rough handling of woman and child in Fergana, Uzbekistan
item.description: In a disturbing incident captured on video and circulated on social networks, a law enforcement officer in Fergana, Uzbekistan, was seen forcibly pushing a woman with a small child into an official vehicle. The incident took place on September 18, 2023, when the woman was allegedly begging for alms at a road intersection and obstructing traffic. According to the Ministry of Internal Affairs, when officers attempted to identify her and bring her to the department for administrative charges, the woman resisted and even threw her small child to the ground while attempting to escape. Despite the absence of a formal complaint from the woman, an internal audit was initiated, leading to the officer's dismissal. Measures are also being taken to prevent the exploitation of infants and minors in begging activities at various locations, including roadways and markets.

media:content.media:description: In a heartwarming scene captured by @Kirill on September 6, 2023, in Gomel, Belarus, the internet witnessed the endearing antics of Mickey, a 5-year-old cat with a peculiar fascination for bathtubs. The video shows Mickey comfortably seated in the bathtub, seemingly content with his impromptu spot. It all began when @Kirill heard the unmistakable sound of their feline friend jumping into the tub, prompting them to investigate.

item.title: Severe flooding ravages streets of Molina de Segura, Spain after record rainstorm
item.description: Severe flooding wreaked havoc in Molina de Segura, Spain, on September 12, 2023, as the streets were transformed into rushing rivers. Eloy Lacal captured video footage of the floodwaters carrying debris such as trash cans, a chair, and a table downstream. To protect their properties, residents of affected buildings barricaded their gates to prevent the floodwaters from inundating their premises. This unprecedented flooding event was the result of a heavy rainstorm that pounded the region, leaving a trail of destruction in its wake.

item.title: Cat takes matters into its own paws: sink becomes impromptu litter box!
item.description: On September 18, 2023, in Gomel, Belarus, @Kirill captured an amusing moment in his kitchen. As he entered the room, he noticed something unusual in his peripheral vision—an image that seemed like a figment of his imagination. However, in a split second, reality set in. His cat was indeed sitting comfortably in the kitchen sink. With the bathroom, the usual location for the cat's litter box, occupied at the time, the resourceful feline wasted no time and decided to take matters into its own paws, opting for the sink instead.

item.title: Crafty duo's failed heist foiled by vigilant bystander in Quilmes, Argentina
item.description: In a surprising turn of events on May 30, 2023, in the Quilmes neighborhood of Buenos Aires, Argentina, surveillance cameras owned by @viverotierrasdelagunasp captured the cunning strategy of a man and a woman attempting to steal electronic merchandise from a store. The footage revealed the pair engaging in a lengthy conversation outside the shop, with the woman eventually entering ahead of the man. As it turns out, this was a deliberate ploy to divert the shop attendant's attention. Once inside, the man swiftly began pilfering electronic goods and stuffing them into his bag. However, their plan was thwarted when an alert bystander observed the theft and intervened just as the man was leaving the store. The shop attendant, along with other customers, rushed outside to join the commotion, leading to the apprehension of the would-be thieves.
item.slugline: Crafty duo's failed heist foiled by vigilant bystander in Quilmes, Argentina

item.title: Terrifying moment: Fuso truck's uncontrolled roll-off on Bukittinggi highway
item.description: A dramatic incident unfolded on September 15, 2023, along the Bukittinggi highway in the Badukuang New area of Lembah Anai, X Koto District, Tanah Datar Regency, Indonesia. A Fuso truck and driven by Ismanto, aged 40, from Padang, suffered a brake malfunction while en route from Padang Panjang to Padang. The truck careened into a roadside wall before colliding with a Toyota Avanza, driven by Indra, aged 57, from Limapuluh cities. Following the impact, the Fuso truck came to a halt on the left lane of the road, and its engine was turned off. Fortunately, there were no casualties, although the truck driver sustained minor injuries. The incident was captured on video by @septianiniii, showing the truck's uncontrolled movement leading to its roll-off. Both vehicles involved sustained damage as a result of the accident.

item.title: Brave vacationers rescue entangled shark in Primorsky Territory, Russia
item.description: On September 16, 2023, in the Primorsky Territory of Russia, quick-thinking vacationers came to the rescue of an entangled Pacific herring shark in Triozerye Bay. Although these sharks are typically non-threatening to humans, they can become trapped in nets or obstacles, posing a danger to themselves. Displaying remarkable courage and compassion, the vacationers used their paddleboards to approach the distressed shark and successfully free it from the entanglement. After the rescue, they captured a memorable moment as video footage alongside the shark before releasing it back into the sea.

item.title: Knife-wielding man terrifies Almaty bus passengers after altercation: police investigation underway
item.description: On August 30, 2023, in Almaty, Kazakhstan, a harrowing incident unfolded on bus No. 135, when a man engaged in a dispute with another passenger escalated the situation by brandishing a knife, causing widespread fear among fellow travelers. Passengers on the bus urgently called for the driver to open the doors, and at the next stop, the armed individual disembarked. Almaty's police department swiftly responded to the incident, with the Auezov district police department launching an investigation. Authorities have identified the individual involved, noting that he is registered at the Mental Health Center. Legal actions in accordance with the Republic of Kazakhstan's legislation are being pursued to address his actions. A video capturing the tense moment showed the man near the bus door, knife in hand, as he threatened fellow passengers.
item.slugline: Knife-wielding man terrifies Almaty bus passengers after altercation: police investigation underway

item.title: Teenage football game turns violent: man punches boy in Rudny, Kazakhstan
item.description: In Rudny, Kazakhstan, on September 10, 2023, a group of teenagers playing football in a residential courtyard at Lenin Street, 177, encountered a disturbing incident when a drunken man invaded their game. The adolescents attempted to leave the premises, but the inebriated intruder managed to catch up with one of the boys, brutally striking him in the jaw with both a fist and a knee. Surveillance cameras captured the assault, leading to swift police intervention. The injured boy is currently receiving medical care, with his condition not deemed life-threatening. Law enforcement authorities have apprehended the assailant, who is now undergoing medical detoxification and faces potential imprisonment for up to two years due to his actions.

item.title: Flooding crisis at Ayuso Hospital due to Begoña Metro pipe break
item.description: On September 14, 2023, a critical situation unfolded at Ayuso Hospital in La Paz, Madrid, Spain. Meylin0226 captured a startling video, wading through water within the hospital's premises, highlighting the dire consequences of a pipe break at the nearby Begoña metro station. The incident was directly linked to ongoing construction work by Metro de Madrid at the Begoña station, leading to extensive flooding within the medical facility. Meylin0226 humorously captioned the video, "It was almost impossible for us to go pick up our clothes from the changing rooms at the La Paz Ayuso Hospital."
item.slugline: Flooding crisis at Ayuso Hospital due to Begoña Metro pipe break

item.title: Sochi residents are up in arms against a woman who “rented” an entire beach during rush hour
item.description: On September 16, 2023, in Sochi, Russia, residents of the Krasnodar Territory were left fuming as they witnessed a woman seemingly monopolizing the entire Mayak beach, basking in solitude while others were crammed together "on top of each other." Outraged beachgoers couldn't help but express their frustration at the apparent display of selfishness. However, it was soon revealed that the woman in question was not an ordinary tourist seeking isolation but an actress hard at work. She was on the beach as part of a film shoot, leaving the disgruntled crowd to realize that their anger had been misplaced.

item.title: Transport police officers heroically rescue man in clinical death at Nizhny Novgorod railway station
item.description: Transport police officers at the Moskovsky railway station in Nizhny Novgorod, Russia, sprang into action on September 12, 2023, when they rescued a man in a state of clinical death. While patrolling the station platform, they noticed a group of three men, one of whom appeared to be unconscious. Upon closer inspection, they confirmed the man's condition and promptly called paramedics. Senior police sergeant Alexey Pazukhin administered lifesaving resuscitation measures, reviving the man, who later revealed he was a father of two. In recognition of their swift and effective response, the police officers were rewarded for their heroic act.

item.title: Brazen smartphone thief caught hanging out of minibus window in Moscow
item.description: On September 14, 2023, in Moscow, Russia, a daring smartphone thief found himself in a precarious situation as he attempted to make a swift exit through the window of a minibus after snatching a passenger's device. The thief's brazen escape attempt was caught on video, showcasing a heart-pounding moment when he hung perilously out of the vehicle window, facing forward. However, his audacious getaway was met with a chorus of loud screams from fellow passengers, who wasted no time in trying to thwart his efforts. Determined to bring the thief to justice, they grabbed hold of his legs, expressing genuine concern for his safety as they grappled with the situation. The victim, not one to be outdone, promptly dialed the police, ensuring that this bold thief's escapade would not go unpunished.

item.title: Rescuers save five-year-old trapped in washing machine in Kazan, Russia
item.description: On September 11, 2023, in Kazan, Russia, a dramatic incident unfolded when an emergency call to the number 112 reported that a five-year-old boy had become trapped inside a washing machine within one of the city's apartments. Swift action was taken as rescuers promptly arrived at the scene. The video footage of the rescue operation revealed the child's lower body wedged within the machine. With remarkable skill and dedication, the rescuers successfully extricated the young boy from his perilous predicament. The child was swiftly handed over to emergency medical personnel for evaluation and care.

item.title: Man in military uniform detonates flash-noise grenade near children in Kazan, Russia
item.description: In a shocking incident in Kazan, Russia, on September 15, 2023, a man dressed in military uniform detonated a flash-noise grenade in the courtyard of a residential high-rise building. The unsettling event was captured on an intercom camera and subsequently circulated on local public pages. The footage showed the man and a young woman seated on a bench. Despite weak attempts to dissuade him, the man proceeded to throw the grenade toward a flowerbed where children, aged 8-10, were standing. An explosion ensued, leaving witnesses in shock. The man, seemingly unfazed by the blast, muttered an apology, while his companion chose to leave.

item.title: Good Samaritan rescues women in mud after electric bike mishap
item.description: In a spontaneous act of kindness, a passerby in Bogor, Indonesia, came to the aid of two women who had encountered a mishap with their electric motorbike. The incident, captured on video by @papahazistlee7 and dated June 30, 2023, shows the two women stuck in the mud on the side of a muddy road, desperately reaching out for assistance. While admitting that he initially found the situation amusing, @papahazistlee7 decided to lend a helping hand. "I was going home when I saw 2 more women asking for help on the side of the road full of mud because they had fallen off their electric motorbike. I didn't see the fall, I just made a video for fun because it was funny, but I helped too," he mentioned.
item.slugline: Good Samaritan rescues women in mud after electric bike mishap

item.title: Ukraine war veteran's inspiring hospital workout after surviving amputation
item.description: In a poignant video captured on September 12, 2023, in Mukachevo, Ukraine, user @6oroga_ua shared a powerful glimpse into his life as a war veteran. Having undergone a leg amputation due to injuries sustained on the front lines during the Ukraine-Russia conflict, he demonstrated incredible resilience. The author recounted the harrowing events of May 29 when he and his comrades found themselves surrounded while changing posts. Amidst a barrage of gunfire, mortar shells, and drones, their commander tragically lost his life. @6oroga_ua's own survival hinged on quick thinking and self-application of a tourniquet after a mine explosion severely injured his leg. Despite these hardships, his determination shines through as he continues to work on his physical fitness.
item.slugline: Ukraine war veteran's inspiring hospital workout after surviving amputation

item.title: Ukrainian soldiers ambush Russian-occupied building
item.description: On March 1, 2023, in Bakhmut, Ukraine, a video captured by @kuzmych.3 showcased a dramatic moment as Ukrainian soldiers launched an assault on a building occupied by Russian forces. In the footage, a pickup truck carrying Ukrainian soldiers can be seen halting as they disembark and retrieve their weapons from the trunk of another vehicle before proceeding to set up an ambush. The video's focus remains on the Ukrainian soldiers, making it impossible to spot the Russians, but the building they were targeting is evident. Notably, one of the soldiers in the video displayed X-rays of injuries sustained during the battle.

item.description: On the evening of August 13, 2023, a tragic incident unfolded on Krasnodarskaya Street in Krasnoyarsk, Russia, as a 10-year-old girl was struck by a Toyota car. Surveillance footage revealed that the young girl had been attempting to cross the road at a controlled pedestrian crossing, although the specific traffic light signal remains unspecified. Tragically, the impact of the collision sent the girl flying several meters, leading to her hospitalization. The driver, a 36-year-old individual, was captured on the surveillance camera. Authorities from the traffic police department are currently investigating the circumstances surrounding this unfortunate incident.

item.title: Surviving the battlefield: Ukrainian soldier's harrowing escape from mortar attack
item.description: On August 8, 2023, near the village of Robotino, Ukraine, Ukrainian soldier @evgenymosolov2 found himself in the midst of a war-stricken area, capturing a chilling video of damaged buildings and the sounds of gunfire in the background. In the video, he recounted a close encounter with danger as a mortar and two tanks fired just ten meters away, resulting in the immediate death of six people and leaving him with a concussion. Thanks to the quick actions of his commander and fellow soldiers, he was evacuated to safety. Upon returning to his unit's resting place, he discovered that the house where they had been staying was destroyed, but miraculously, his comrades were alive and well.

item.title: Dramatic turn of events: fire engulfs Lamborghini Aventador during Moscow photoshoot
item.description: On August 6, 2023, in the heart of Moscow, Russia, a routine photoshoot took an unexpected turn as @harleydavidson700 captured a thrilling moment on camera. While photographing their 1967 Mustang for a blogger's feature, a Lamborghini Aventador made a stylish entrance into Khilkov Lane. However, what started as a picturesque moment quickly transformed into a dramatic scene when smoke billowed from the Lamborghini's rear. Quick-thinking @harleydavidson700 and their friends rushed to alert the driver, who initially didn't grasp the urgency. Despite swift response from firefighters, the car succumbed to flames due to water shortages in the area. Fortunately, everyone emerged unscathed, leaving behind an unforgettable day captured on video.

item.title: Camera's sandy surprise: heart-shaped beach adventure
item.description: In a spontaneous beachside escapade in South Korea on September 9, 2023, @amar_baiaz embarked on a unique endeavor, capturing his adventure on camera. With creativity in mind, he dug a heart-shaped hole in the sand and nestled his camera inside it to document his experience. However, as he attempted to retrieve the camera, an unexpected turn of events occurred. Sand cascaded into the hole, obstructing the lens and bringing an abrupt end to the video. @amar_baiaz expressed his surprise, stating, "I dug a hole up to my elbows, I didn’t expect this to happen."

item.title: Conflict escalates: Ukrainian soldier prepares drone for strikes against Russian Forces near Bakhmut
item.description: In a concerning development amidst the ongoing conflict between Ukraine and Russia, a video captured by @lid_skhid on January 7, 2023, in Zabakhmutka, Bakhmut, Ukraine, has revealed the use of armed drones by Ukrainian forces. The footage shows the preparation and launch of a war drone, armed with what appears to be a mini missile. This drone later that day, flew approximately 800 meters from a local fire station to a trench where nine Russian individuals were situated. Shockingly, the drone dropped a total of 20 explosive payloads in a single day.

item.title: Near miss: pedestrian narrowly escapes truck collision in Krasnoyarsk, Russia
item.description: In a heart-stopping incident near Krasnoyarsk, Russia, on September 11, 2023, a pedestrian narrowly escaped a catastrophic collision with a multi-ton truck. The harrowing moment was captured on video as the truck careened off the road, hurtling towards the pedestrian at high speed. Miraculously, the pedestrian managed to evade the oncoming disaster just in the nick of time. The truck, however, plowed through a fence and tumbled into a ditch, severing a power line and overturning in the process. The video footage shows the truck's cab detaching from the rest of the vehicle as it veered off the road. The fate of the truck's driver remains uncertain.

item.title: Confetti mishap at daughter's birthday party leads to food fiasco
item.description: During a birthday celebration in Semporna, Sabah, Malaysia, captured in a video by @princesshermossa03 on August 17, 2023, a moment of excitement turned into a culinary calamity. As confetti rained down during their daughter's birthday party, the festivities took an unexpected turn when it landed directly into uncovered food, much to the dismay of the husband. item.title: Emergency landing in Novosibirsk: Ural Airlines flight safely evacuated
item.description: On September 12, 2023, a Ural Airlines plane en route from Sochi to Omsk made an emergency landing in the Novosibirsk region in Russia, specifically in the Ubinsk area. The aircraft, carrying 167 passengers, touched down on a grass field. The cause of the incident was a lack of fuel, which occurred as a result of a change in landing airport due to a failure of the hydraulic system on the plane. Fortunately, there were no casualties, and all passengers were safely evacuated. They have since been transported to Omsk via train.

item.title: Heroic rescue: Dagestan electrical worker saves cat stuck on power pole
item.description: In a heartwarming incident in Dagestan, Russia, on September 10, 2023, an employee of the Levashinsky district electrical networks performed a daring rescue. A cat had found itself stranded atop a power line support pole, unable or unwilling to make its way down. Devoid of the feline's natural climbing abilities, the man utilized a specialized tool known as fitter's claws to carefully retrieve the distressed cat. He then called for assistance from his colleagues, who arrived with a piece of cloth to hold the cat as it made its way down. With a gentle release from the pole, the cat descended to safety, unharmed.

item.title: A glimpse of desperation: terrible living conditions inside Marinka's war-torn basements
item.description: In a gripping video captured by @dimka_dmitrivich on August 5, 2023, in Marinka, Donetsk Oblast, Ukraine, an elderly lady bravely reveals the dire living conditions endured by locals in the midst of the ongoing conflict between Russia and Ukraine. The footage paints a stark picture of life in the basement, where battered shelves, a weathered dinner table, a meager water tank, and a few other items are all residents have to make do with. @dimka_dmitrivich is among the unsung heroes tirelessly working to help evacuate and support people trapped in these war-torn areas, shedding light on the harsh realities they face daily.

item.title: Miraculous escape: two survive terrifying car crash in Pavlovsky Posad
item.description: In a harrowing incident on the evening of August 20, 2023, Pavlovsky Posad, Russia, witnessed a serious accident that left bystanders in awe of the miraculous outcome. The accident occurred on Kirova Street, number 19, when the driver of a foreign car lost control while navigating a turn, leading to the vehicle overturning. Eyewitnesses reported a terrifying scene as the driver was ejected through the windshield due to the force of the impact. Surveillance footage captured the car careening at high speed, striking a curb, and landing upside down on the road. Fortunately, the fate seemed to smile upon all those involved, as there were no other vehicles or pedestrians in the vicinity at the time. Concerned passers-by rushed to the scene and, remarkably, found that none of the individuals in the car had sustained serious injuries.

item.title: Hare's chivalrous defense: Justy's maternal instinct and the battle against nets
item.description: On June 3, 2023, in the Moscow region of Domodedov, Russia, an intriguing incident unfolded in the world of hare rescue and conservation. Captured on video by @suprememazay1, the footage showcased a remarkable display of maternal instinct by a hare named Justy. Despite her sterilization, Justy fervently defended her fellow hares from being caught in nets by a dedicated hare rescuer, Belyak Slava. Justy's actions demonstrated a deep-rooted reflex formed during her days as a mother hare, highlighting the complexity of animal behavior. In this peculiar story, it became evident that, in the realm of the House of the Hare, even after motherhood, bonds and instincts could prove stronger than expected.

item.title: Unleashed shepherd takes the wheel: dog holds bus hostage in Rostov's Staraya Stanitsa
item.description: On the morning of September 9, 2023, in the village of Staraya Stanitsa near Kamensk in Russia's Rostov region, an unusual incident unfolded that left locals both bewildered and amused. A bold dog, resembling a shepherd, commandeered a passenger bus near the Charm store, prompting the driver and all passengers to evacuate. Although the canine intruder didn't exhibit direct aggression, it firmly maintained control over the vehicle, resisting attempts to coax it out with sausages. Local rescuer Evgeny Filippenkov came to the rescue, donning protective gear, armed with a stick and rope, and successfully led the determined dog out of the bus. Presently, the dog awaits its owner's return at a nearby watermelon point of sale, serving as a peculiar reminder of a remarkable day in Staraya Stanitsa.

item.title: Vandal shatters princess Turandot sculpture in Arbat, Moscow
item.description: In a shocking act of vandalism, an unknown man wreaked havoc on the historic Princess Turandot sculpture, located in front of the Vakhtangov Theater in the heart of Moscow's Arbat district in Russia. The incident, which took place on September 9, 2023, was captured on video and has left both art enthusiasts and theatergoers stunned. The iconic fountain-monument, erected in 1997 to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the first production of the eponymous play, has deep roots in the theater's rich history, dating back to the premiere of "The Miracle of St. Anthony" in 1921. As the man climbed atop the statue, his reckless actions led to the sculpture's dramatic shattering, sending him tumbling down in a startling descent, marking a tragic chapter in the theater's legacy. The man was taken to Botkin Hospital with fractures and a head injury.
item.slugline: Vandal shatters princess Turandot sculpture in Arbat, Moscow

item.title: Brave Volzhsky residents foil robbery attempt, subdue intoxicated attacker
item.description: In the city of Volzhsky, located in the Volgograd Region of Russia, a small grocery store turned into the scene of a courageous act on September 4, 2023. When an unknown assailant attempted to rob the store and harass its saleswoman, two fearless Volga residents swiftly intervened. In a dramatic scuffle caught on CCTV cameras provided by the Main Directorate of the Ministry of Internal Affairs for the Volgograd Region, these local heroes confronted the criminal. Although one of them was knocked down by a single powerful blow, they managed to subdue the intoxicated attacker along with the help of a third man. The brave actions of these citizens led to the apprehension of the 33-year-old local resident, who had a previous criminal record. A criminal case has been initiated under the charge of "Robbery," highlighting the unwavering spirit of Volzhsky's community in protecting their own.

item.title: Violent fight erupts at Moscow metro station: stowaway assaults fellow passenger
item.description: In a shocking incident at Moscow's Narodnoye Opolchenie metro station on August 10, 2023, a 24-year-old unemployed man launched an unprovoked attack on a fellow passenger, resulting in his detention by metro officers. The assailant had reportedly followed the victim through the turnstile and received a reprimand for his actions. In response, he unleashed a barrage of punches, beating the passenger before they were separated by a courageous bystander. The head of the press service for the capital's prosecutor's office, Lyudmila Nefedova, confirmed that the attacker's actions are classified under the article "Beatings," and emphasized that bringing him to criminal responsibility is now under the jurisdiction of the prosecutor's office of the Moscow Metro
item.slugline: Violent fight erupts at Moscow metro station: stowaway assaults fellow passenger

item.title: Terrifying 6.2 magnitude earthquake strikes La Serena
item.description: On the evening of September 6, 2023, at approximately 20:48 local time, a medium-intensity earthquake with a magnitude of 6.2 rattled the coastal city of La Serena, Chile. The unsettling event was captured in a video by @AmpueroOsvaldo, who happened to be at Insumos Isla Negra at the time. The footage showed the immediate impact of the quake as objects inside a house trembled and some boxes tumbled to the floor. There were no reported injuries.

item.title: Climate Protesters evicted from Arthur Ashe Stadium after halting U.S. open women's semi-final
item.description: In a dramatic turn of events at the U.S. Open women's semi-final held at Arthur Ashe Stadium in New York City on September 7, 2023, climate protesters brought the tennis match between American Coco Gauff and Czech Karolina Muchova to a standstill for nearly an hour. The demonstrators, rallying against fossil fuel use, managed to infiltrate the stadium and stage a protest, causing a significant delay in the highly anticipated match. However, their disruption was short-lived as security swiftly removed the protesters from the venue, allowing the game to finally resume.

item.title: Climate change protestors disrupt US open semifinal, delay match for 49 minutes
item.description: September 8, 2023, in New York City's Arthur Ashe Stadium, a U.S. Open Tennis Championships semifinal match between Coco Gauff and Karolina Muchova was momentarily brought to a halt as four environmental protesters took center stage in the upper levels of the stadium. Captured by @troyheibein, the protesters' demonstration called for an end to fossil fuels, with chants reverberating through the crowd. The disruption caused a 49-minute delay in the match.
